root.name: Karaoke Revolution: Glee
root.description: Overview Konami will utilize the familiar formula from previous Karaoke Revolution games and apply them to Karaoke Revolution: Glee. Over 29 tracks from the first 13 episodes of Season 1 are available and while players will not have to option to create a character, they can interact with the show's main cast, Rachel Berry, Finn Hudson, and Will Schuster. Multiplayer consists of a duet mode with a friend where players can team up to perform songs. Performances will unlock themed items and memorable scenes from the show which can be accessed from in Scrapbook Mode. Song List And I Am Telling You I Am Not Going Bust A Move Can’t Fight This Feeling Defying GravityDon’t Rain On My ParadeDon’t Stand So Close To Me Young Girl Don’t Stop Believin’ Endless Love Gold Digger Hair/Crazy In Love Hate on Me I’ll Stand By You I Say A Little PrayerImagine Keep Holding On Lean On Me Leaving On A Jet Plane My Life Would Suck Without You No Air Papa Don’t Preach Proud Mary Push It Smile (Cover of Charlie Chaplin Song) Smile (Cover of Lily Allen Song) Somebody To Love Sweet Caroline Taking Chances True Colors You Can’t Always Get What You Want
